Text: Almost 300 seeders and no comments? Wtf? For some reason when I go to install everything is just in a bunch of random ass characters that don't define any certain language, it's literally just a bunch of bullshit. Is this safe?
It's a "repack". They strip everything but the game-related stuff and one language (usually English) to make the file size as small as possible, then use a cracked installer. It's solid.
